comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: frostback1, Many thanks for this info - we just corrected three records. Per our researcher here, various websites seem to interchange Shepherd and Shepheard when referring to this hotel, but the hotel was named after its first manager, Samuel Shepheard. See sites: www.right-travel.com/hotels www.bbc.co.uk/history/ancient/egyptians/death_sakkara_gal...
